title: Get CAR MODEL-has-prime-image Relationship
user_story:
As an API consumer\
I want to be able to request the prime IMAGE for a CAR MODEL\
So I can represent the node in the best possible form in the frontend\
(Because I don't know which one from the image gallery is the best one)
description:
# Specification

* Requests are rejected with a `404` error when the CAR MODEL doesn't exist.
* Requests are rejected with a `404` error when a node with the given ID actually exists, but is not a CAR MODEL.
* The relationship is successfully returned when one actually exists. → Status code `200`.
  * A JSON object with the relationship information is returned:
    * `car_model_id`: integer
    * `image_id`: integer
    * `relationship_id`: integer
    * `relationship_name`: string → `has-prime-image`
* When there exists no `has-prime-image` relationship for the CAR MODEL then an empty response is returned. → Status code `200`.
